entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wekweeti
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:13 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 50 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
